tcModuleConfig.description: Octopus Modul zur Realisierung von Cronjobs

task.name: getCronJobNames
task.description: Returns the names of all cronjobs as a list

task.name: getCronJobs
task.description: Returns a List with Cronjob-Maps of every existing cronjob

task.name: getCronJob
task.description: Returns a Cronjob-Map for a Cronjob specified by its name (cronjobname)

task.name: getCronJobStatus
task.description: Returns the status of a Cronjob specified by a CronJobMap (cronjob) or its name (cronjobname)

task.name: getAvailableCronJobTypes
task.description: Returns all types of Cronjobs as List

task.name: getAvailableCronJobProperties
task.description: Returns a list of possible properties for a specific type of cronjob. Input must be a cronjob-type as Integer.

task.name: activateCronJob
task.description: Activates a Cronjob specified by a CronJobMap (cronjob) or its name (cronjobname)

task.name: deactivateCronJob
task.description: Deactivates a Cronjob specified by a CronJobMap (cronjob) or its name (cronjobname)

task.name: startCronJobRoutine
task.description: Starts or reactivates the routine that handles all cronjobs

task.name: stopCronJobRoutine
task.description: Stops the routine that handles all cronjobs. This will not stop immediately but will avoid that the routine starts again.

task.name: setCronJob
task.description: Creates or Modifies a Cronjob. Input parameter must be a CronJobMap (cronjob) Returns CronJobmap (cronjob) if succesfull and null if not succesfull.

task.name: removeCronJob
task.description: Removes a Cronjob from the queue and consequently deletes it. Input parameter must be a CronJobMap (cronjob) or the specific name (cronjobname). Returns CronJobmap (cronjob) if succesfull and null if not succesfull.

task.name: runCronJob
task.description: Starts a Cronjob immediately. The Cronjob is specified by a CronJobMap (cronjob) or by name (cronjobname)
